import * as React from 'react'; import {Container, Button, Modal, InputGroup, FormControl} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import Note from './Note.js' export default function Notes() { const [show, SetShow] = useState(false); const [notesList, SetNotesList] = useState([]); async function SaveNote() { var note = { date: document.getElementById("inputDate").value, title: document.getElementById("inputTitle").value, description: document.getElementById("inputDescription").value, } var copy = [...notesList]; copy.push(note); SetNotesList(copy); SetShow(false); } return(<>
